clauses.title: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice
clauses.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.

clauses.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
clauses.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.

clauses.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.

clauses.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

clauses.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them
clauses.description: The service can claim ownership on feedback, proposals, ideas and suggestions submitted by the users, who may waive their "moral rights" on that feedback.

clauses.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.

clauses.title: This service keeps a license on user-generated content even after users close their accounts.
clauses.description: The service may still use your content and display it after you stopped using it by closing your account. The case applies to terms requiring users to grant them a perpetual license over that content.

clauses.title: This service can license user content to third parties
clauses.description: By posting content through the Services, users grant them a transferable and/or sublicensable right, which allows user content to be licensed to third parties.

clauses.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.

clauses.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes
clauses.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.

clauses.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

clauses.title: The service may collect extra data about you through promotions
clauses.description: Additional personal data may be collected through contests, surveys, promotions, petitions or sweepstakes.

clauses.title: Users have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service
clauses.description: If you wish to bring legal action against a service about a past incident, you may not be able to do so if the Terms you agreed to implied a limited amount of time. As a result it may be worthy to carefully read that section of the Terms to know exactly how much time you might have before your right to take legal action expires.

clauses.title: You waive your right to a class action.
clauses.description: The right to be represented in a class action (or representative action) exists in the US and some European countries. It allows people who have been similarly injured by the same accused to take legal action by a single lawsuit instead of individually. Some Terms of Service try to limit that right. By agreeing to them, you could waive (= renounce to) your right to a class action, which might reduce your chances to be successful in a case.

clauses.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising
clauses.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

clauses.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
clauses.description: The service tracks the user count or some actions of the user; this is usually used for statistics. For example, emails sent by a service can contain a pixel tag, which is a small, clear image that can tell them whether or not you have opened an email and what your IP address is.

clauses.title: Users can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information
clauses.description: The service does not require users to reveal personal information for most of its website. However, it may still collect anonymous logs.

clauses.title: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you
clauses.description: The cookies used only collect anonymous, aggregated data that cannot be linked to a unique identity.

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

clauses.title: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online
The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis
clauses.description: Users know the date the privacy policy was last updated and can thus infer the next time it will be reviewed. This gives users more certainty about how long they can trust the current policy to apply.

clauses.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
clauses.description: The service employs your data to target ads to you, but you can opt-out of this interest-based advertising.

clauses.title: The service provides a free help desk
clauses.description: The service can be easily contacted for questions or provides a support center at no extra cost.

clauses.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
clauses.description: The service can pay for your content and you are allowed to make it commercially available to other services/parties.

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

clauses.title: The service can distribute your content through any media known now or in the future
You are allowed to quote their content with attribution
Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

clauses.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents
This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
clauses.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.

clauses.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed
The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.

clauses.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.

clauses.title: This service employs separate policies for different parts of the service
clauses.description: The user may need to read additional product-specific agreements depending on the way the service is used.

clauses.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location
